Well, I know better than to ask which you prefer to be called by.  Can I call you 'Jime?  (Jon should be made a moderator and we can give him Souji, ne?)
 
Geez, an RPG made up of the members in miburo would be fun...  
 
pachi

Warg3791@... wrote:
In a message dated 3/17/2004 12:31:14 PM Eastern Standard Time, 
spiritus_saitou@... writes:
I'll be working on it today.  I'll invite you guys personally.  And I'll name 
it SHQ Spy Division. Hey, fellow squad captain... whatever your name is... 
you willing to help moderate the information coming in from spies and keep them 
from wreaking havoc?

pachi (beginning to think I'm in an RPG)
Sure. Why not? (I suppose you're talking to me...)

-Okita/Saito , formerly MissBehavin (suffering multiple personalities.)
